Sinopse: Based on the classic works of Edgar Allan Poe, directors Bart Mastronardi & Alan Rowe Kelly have assembled an award-winning cast & crew for the highly anticipated film Tales Of Poe.  A unique new spin on three of Poes popular stories (The Tell Tale Heart, The Cask of Amontillado & Dreams), Mastronardi & Kelly weave together a compelling and suspenseful anthology that will captivate Poe enthusiasts and horror fans alike!
